document_data.caption: Kellesar on a map of Ulgarth.
document_data.name: Kellesar
document_data.mainbody: '''Kellesar''' was a settlement near the kingdom of [[Ulgarth]] in [[southeast Faerûn]]. It lay at the southern end of [[Barbarians' Road]], which formed the border between Ulgarth and the [[barbarian lands (Utter East)|barbarian lands]] of the east,<ref> amidst the [[Stony Waste]].
